Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Stormhawk Axe comes with Thunderstorm Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Warped Axe
weapons.flavorText:
Oversized double-headed axe with a bizarre, almost melted appearance.
 Brute strength is the only thing required to wield this weapon, which appears to have taken quite the beating itself.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Warped Axe is a uncommon Axe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Warped Axe comes with War Cry Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Axe Of Godrick
weapons.flavorText:
Greataxe wielded by Godrick the Grafted. This golden battleaxe is emblazoned with the figure of a beast, representing the strength of Godfrey, First Elden Lord and patriarch of the golden lineage. 
"I command thee kneel! For I am the lord of all that is golden!"
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Axe Of Godrick is a legendary Greataxe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Axe Of Godrick comes with I Command Thee, Kneel! Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Butchering Knife
weapons.flavorText:
Huge carving knife made to cleanly butcher the human body.
 Signature weapon of the Ogress Anastasia, known to have eaten countless Tarnished while disguised as a Finger Maiden.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Butchering Knife is a rare Greataxe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Butchering Knife comes with Barbaric Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Crescent Moon Axe
weapons.flavorText:
Greataxe with a large, arcing blade and long handle. The "Crescent Moon" of its name is said to have been spurred by nostalgia.
 Specializes in sweeping through foes by making use of its long handle.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Crescent Moon Axe is a common Greataxe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Crescent Moon Axe comes with War Cry Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Executioner's Greataxe
weapons.flavorText:
Bulky cleaver welded to a long haft. Said to have been used to dispatch the remnants of defeated armies, felling them like timber. 
Perhaps that is the reason it excels at critical hits.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Executioner's Greataxe is a uncommon Greataxe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Executioner's Greataxe comes with War Cry Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Gargoyle's Black Axe
weapons.flavorText:
Bronze greataxe wielded by Valiant Gargoyles, mended with blackened corpse wax. Deals holy damage. 
Such is the mark of those who serve Maliketh, the Black Blade.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Gargoyle's Black Axe is a rare Greataxe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Gargoyle's Black Axe comes with War Cry Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Gargoyle's Great Axe
weapons.flavorText:
Bronze greataxe wielded by Valiant Gargoyles.
Just like the wielder, the missing parts have been mended with corpse wax; a patchwork of champions.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Gargoyle's Great Axe is a uncommon Greataxe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Gargoyle's Great Axe comes with War Cry Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Greataxe
weapons.flavorText:
Greataxe akin to a huge lump of iron. Recognized as the weapon of choice of badland chieftains. 
Too heavy to be wielded by those of merely ordinary strength, blows from this axe will flatten enemies, and the force of its charged attack is a sight to behold.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Greataxe is a common Greataxe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Greataxe comes with Barbaric Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Great Omenkiller Cleaver
weapons.flavorText:
The blade of this huge, loathsome cleaver comprises a row of amputated Omen horns. Weapon of slaughter wielded by Omenkillers. 
The hideous horns cause blood loss, adding vibrant colors to the ongoing mayhem.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Great Omenkiller Cleaver is a uncommon Greataxe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Great Omenkiller Cleaver comes with Wild Strikes Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Longhaft Axe
weapons.flavorText:
Large iron axe with a long handle. Weapon of the maltreated Misbegotten. 
Making use of the force generated by its length, this weapon's resentment-charged blows are difficult to stop.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Longhaft Axe is a common Greataxe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Longhaft Axe comes with War Cry Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Rusted Anchor
weapons.flavorText:
A rusty anchor wielded as a weapon. Each of its four flukes is thick and sharp, enabling piercing attacks. 
While the Tarnished left the Lands Between with their Lord, one boat alone was said to have been left behind.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Rusted Anchor is a uncommon Greataxe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Rusted Anchor comes with Barbaric Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Winged Greathorn
weapons.flavorText:
Distinctive horn suffused with the power of ancestral spirits. This large, wing-shaped specimen is wielded as a weapon of spirit worship. 
In the ancestral spirit-worshipping faith, these are considered envoys' wings, made to reap the lives of beings which experience no sprouting.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Winged Greathorn is a legendary Greataxe in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Winged Greathorn comes with Soul Stifler Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Club
weapons.flavorText:
A thick, solid lump of wood. Wielding this striking weapon requires no skill. 
A simple, primitive weapon that requires only brute strength and persistence to hammer your foe into the ground.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Club is a common Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Club comes with Barbaric Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Curved Club
weapons.flavorText:
Hard, curved club, shaped like a crescent moon. 
Wielded instead of a curved sword by Albinaurics lacking dexterity. The only point of similarity between the two is the shape.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Curved Club is a common Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Curved Club comes with Barbaric Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Envoy's Horn
weapons.flavorText:
Golden horn of the Oracle Envoys. Profoundly weighty, its blows are sure to be felt. 
Originally an instrument, but one that cannot be sounded by a mere human. Or perhaps it is too early to sound the call.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Envoy's Horn is a rare Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Envoy's Horn comes with Oracular Bubble Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Hammer
weapons.flavorText:
Hammer comprised of a large stone affixed to a metal handle. Originally a blacksmith's tool. 
The art of smithing is said to have originated among the giants. This weapon's striking attacks boast ample weight behind them.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Hammer is a uncommon Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Hammer comes with Kick Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Mace
weapons.flavorText:
An iron bludgeon with sharp protrusions.
 Striking attacks have few drawbacks, potent as they are at breaking through guards and stances, Most suited to head on slugging matches.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Mace is a common Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Mace comes with Kick Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Marika's Hammer
weapons.flavorText:
Stone hammer made in the lands of the Numen, outside the Lands Between. The tool with which Queen Marika shattered the Elden Ring and Radagon attempted to repair it. 
The hammer partially broke upon shattering the Ring, becoming splintered with rune fragments.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Marika's Hammer is a legendary Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Marika's Hammer comes with Gold Breaker Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Monk's Flamemace
weapons.flavorText:
Battle hammer made to resemble flickering flames. Signature weapon of the Fire Monks, who hail from the Mountaintops of the Giants. 
The unique strong attack rouses fiery combative spirit.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Monk's Flamemace is a uncommon Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Monk's Flamemace comes with Kick Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Morning Star
weapons.flavorText:
Battle hammer comprised of a globe attached to a handle. Though a bludgeon dealing strike damage, the appellative star is covered in spikes which cause blood loss. 
Ironic given its graceful name, this weapon often reeks of blood.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Morning Star is a uncommon Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Morning Star comes with Kick Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Nox Flowing Hammer
weapons.flavorText:
Mace shaped like a suspended metal droplet wielded by monks of the Eternal City. 
Forged from liquid metal from a Silver Tear, it is thoroughly tempered until hardened.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Nox Flowing Hammer is a rare Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Nox Flowing Hammer comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Ringed Finger
weapons.flavorText:
Bludgeon made of an enormous finger sheathed in several heavy rings. Thought to have been cut from an ancestor of the Fingercreeper. 
Some life yet remains in this legacy of an ancient act of blasphemy, as evidenced by the barely perceptible warmth it still exudes.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Ringed Finger is a rare Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Ringed Finger comes with Claw Flick Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Scepter Of The All-knowing
weapons.flavorText: Scepter in the form of a hand grasping a pearl. Signature weapon of Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. The pearl stands for the world, the heavens, and an eye, representing the many forms of knowledge, never fully attainable. Even knowing that, the All-Knowing's hand grasps for it.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Scepter Of The All-knowing is a rare Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Scepter Of The All-knowing comes with Knowledge Above All Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Spiked Club
weapons.flavorText:
A club with beast fangs wrapped around the striking end. The uneven spread of fangs causes blood loss. 
Given only to the toughest of demi-humans, this weapon is a badge of honor. Or so the demi-humans believe.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Spiked Club is a uncommon Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Spiked Club comes with Barbaric Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Stone Club
weapons.flavorText:
Signature weapon of battlemages, hewn from hard glintstone. This club is much heavier than its size suggests, but has no magic power.
 So that they not lose sight of the true essence of combat, battlemages prefer to feel the impact of their blows, fighting their opponents hand to hand.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Stone Club is a common Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Stone Club comes with Kick Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Varre's Bouquet
weapons.flavorText:
A steel mace resembling a charming bouquet of roses. Each petal has a sharpened edge, leaving the roses perpetually colored with blood. 
This weapon reflects White Mask Varré's manner of speech rather well, enticing in its splendor, but full of deadly consequence.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Varre's Bouquet is a uncommon Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Arcane scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Varre's Bouquet comes with Blood Tax Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Warpick
weapons.flavorText:
Battle hammer with a hard protruding beak. A pickaxe designed for combat, in essence. 
A simple but highly effective weapon, the weighty piercing attack casually rips through metal armor.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Warpick is a uncommon Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Warpick comes with Kick Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Bastard's Stars
weapons.flavorText:
Flail which deals magic damage, having been imbued with power by the remembrance of Astel. 
Formed of the same many-colored star debris that comprised the form of the Naturalborn of the Void.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Bastard's Stars is a legendary Flail in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Bastard's Stars comes with Nebula Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Chainlink Flail
weapons.flavorText:
A spiked iron tube attached by a chain wielded by Mad Pumpkin Heads. 
Especially large for a flail, wielding it requires more strength than it does dexterity.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Chainlink Flail is a uncommon Flail in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Chainlink Flail comes with Spinning Chain Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Family Heads
weapons.flavorText:
Three bludgeoning copper heads attached to a handle by chains. Signature weapon of Necromancer Garris, the heretical sage. 
The heads were made to resemble those of his wife and two children.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Family Heads is a rare Flail in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Family Heads comes with Familial Rancor Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Flail
weapons.flavorText:
Weapon consisting of a bludgeoning head attached to a handle by chain. The iron ball is spiked and induces blood loss. 
Blows from this weapon cannot be parried. The charge attack whirls the iron ball around for increased force before striking.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Flail is a common Flail in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Flail comes with Spinning Chain Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Nightrider Flail
weapons.flavorText: A flail with two additional bludgeoning heads. Weapon of the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds. The large spikes make it highly effective at inducing blood loss, but also demand higher dexterity to wield.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Nightrider Flail is a uncommon Flail in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Nightrider Flail comes with Spinning Chain Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Battle Hammer
weapons.flavorText:
Large iron great hammer designed for gladiatorial combat. Used by duelists who were exiled from the colosseum. 
Weighty enough to crush armor and its wearer alike.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Battle Hammer is a uncommon Great Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Battle Hammer comes with Braggart's Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Beastclaw Greathammer
weapons.flavorText:
Greathammer with a striking end modelled to resemble five beastly claws. 
The black nails protruding from golden fur are said to represent Serosh, Lord of Beasts, who went to become King Godfrey's Regent.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Beastclaw Greathammer is a rare Great Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Beastclaw Greathammer comes with Regal Beastclaw Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Brick Hammer
weapons.flavorText:
Weapon made from an ordinary stone brick. Wielded by a laborer who lead a rebellion, and later become a champion himself. 
Even among other bludgeons of its size, this weapon is especially weighty. The strength of a giant is required to wield it.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Brick Hammer is a uncommon Great Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Brick Hammer comes with Barbaric Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Celebrant's Skull
weapons.flavorText:
Large bludgeon decorated with flowers and many-colored fabrics. Ceremonial tool used by dancers during the festivities of Dominula, Windmill Village. 
The striking end is a skull too large in size to be human.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Celebrant's Skull is a uncommon Great Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Celebrant's Skull comes with Barbaric Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Cranial Vessel Candlestand
weapons.flavorText: Candlestand used in worship of Birac, the most hallowed Monk Prelate of the Giants' Flame. Concerned over the lazy arrogance with which the monks treated the Flame, Birac severed his own head as a lesson to the others, intending it be used as a candlestand. His faith yet smolders from within the cranial vessel.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Cranial Vessel Candlestand is a rare Great Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Cranial Vessel Candlestand comes with Surge Of Faith Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Curved Great Club
weapons.flavorText:
Large curved club of hard wood, shaped like a crescent moon. 
Wielded by Albinaurics lacking the dexterity demanded by a curved sword, and who prefer the added weight and destructive force.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Curved Great Club is a common Great Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Curved Great Club comes with Barbaric Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Devourer's Scepter
weapons.flavorText:
Scepter in the shape of a serpent devouring the world. This weapon will one day become the very symbol of the Lord of Blasphemy. One of the legendary armaments. 
A vision of the future briefly seen by Rykard in his final moments before being devoured by the great serpent.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Devourer's Scepter is a legendary Great Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Devourer's Scepter comes with Devourer Of Worlds Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Envoy's Long Horn
weapons.flavorText:
Long golden horn of the Oracle Envoys. Profoundly weighty, its blows are sure to be felt.
 Originally an instrument, but one that cannot be sounded by a mere human. Or perhaps it is too early to sound the call.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Envoy's Long Horn is a rare Great Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Envoy's Long Horn comes with Bubble Shower Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Great Mace
weapons.flavorText:
Huge bludgeon with sharp protrusions. An enlarged version of its smaller cousin.
 Maintains all the advantages of smaller bludgeons, boasting few deficiencies while being very capable at breaking enemy guards and stances. A shrewd choice for simple slugging matches.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Great Mace is a common Great Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Great Mace comes with Endure Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Great Stars
weapons.flavorText:
Huge bludgeon with three stars at the striking end. Though primarily a striking weapon, the stars' spikes cause blood loss. 
A blood-stained star is an ill omen.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Great Stars is a uncommon Great Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Great Stars comes with Endure Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Greathorn Hammer
weapons.flavorText: Huge thick horn carved with tree ring-like markings adapted into a bludgeoning weapon. Wielded by ancestral follower warriors. The ancient horn is imbued with the power of ancestral spirits.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Greathorn Hammer is a uncommon Great Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Greathorn Hammer comes with Barbaric Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Large Club
weapons.flavorText:
A thick, solid lump of wood. Wielding this striking weapon requires no skill. 
A simple, primitive weapon that requires only brute strength to swing about.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Large Club is a common Great Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Large Club comes with Barbaric Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Pickaxe
weapons.flavorText:
Large pickaxe designed to crack thick bedrock. Tool of sturdy miners.
 Not originally designed as a weapon, but very adept at piercing armor.
 "Little wretches, do you think your armor harder than stone?"
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Pickaxe is a common Great Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Pickaxe comes with Endure Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Rotten Battle Hammer
weapons.flavorText:
Large iron great hammer designed for gladiatorial combat, now festering with scarlet rot. 
Weighty enough to crush armor and its wearer alike.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Rotten Battle Hammer is a uncommon Great Hammer in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it has innate Scarlet Rot buildup on hit.
Rotten Battle Hammer comes with Braggart's Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Axe Of Godfrey
weapons.flavorText: Weapon of Godfrey, Elden Lord. It was broken in a battle fought as leader of the Tarnished during the Long March. This weapon is symbolic of Godfrey's vow to conduct himself as a lord, later becoming an emblem of the golden lineage. In the days of the past, a crown was warranted with strength.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Axe Of Godfrey is a legendary Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Axe Of Godfrey comes with Regal Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Dragon Greatclaw
weapons.flavorText:
Weapon said to have been whittled from the claw of a great, ancient dragon, wielded by grotesque Tree Sentinels who yet serve the Erdtree. 
The claw is enwreathed with lightning, and tears through the dragons' feeble descendants with ease.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Dragon Greatclaw is a rare Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Lightning damage and has Strength scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Dragon Greatclaw comes with Endure Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Duelist Greataxe
weapons.flavorText:
Greataxe designed for gladiatorial combat. Used by duelists who were exiled from the colosseum. 
A weapon reserved for duelist champions, the charge attack is particularly ferocious.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Duelist Greataxe is a common Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Duelist Greataxe comes with Endure Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Envoy's Greathorn
weapons.flavorText:
Fanned golden horn of the Oracle Envoys. Profoundly weighty, its blows are sure to be felt. 
Originally an instrument, but one that cannot be sounded by a mere human. Or perhaps it is too early to sound the call.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Envoy's Greathorn is a rare Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Envoy's Greathorn comes with Great Oracular Bubble Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Fallingstar Beast Jaw
weapons.flavorText:
Part of a Falling star Beast's jaw, hard and shining black, fashioned into a weapon. 
With its sharp point, this colossal weapon can skewer foes.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Fallingstar Beast Jaw is a rare Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Fallingstar Beast Jaw comes with Gravity Bolt Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Ghiza's Wheel
weapons.flavorText:
Great iron wheel lined with flesh-flaying blades. Device of torture used by Inquisitor Ghiza. As the wheel spins it causes severe pain and blood loss. 
The design was adopted for use as the iconic weapon wielded by Iron Virgins.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Ghiza's Wheel is a rare Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Ghiza's Wheel comes with Spinning Wheel Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Giant-crusher
weapons.flavorText: A hammer made from a boulder, used in the War against the Giants. One of the heftiest weapons in the entire Lands Between. After the giants were quelled, and man turned against man in violence, this weapon was all but forgotten. Man has grown feeble in comparison to his forebears.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Giant-crusher is a uncommon Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Giant-crusher comes with Endure Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Great Club
weapons.flavorText: An enormous club of hardwood. Wildly hammering foes with this striking weapon requires no dexterity; only brute force. While it may seem sacrilegious, this weapon is said to be a withered branch of the Erdtree. Imbued with holy power, this weapon will never snap.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Great Club is a uncommon Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Great Club comes with Golden Land Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Golem's Halberd
weapons.flavorText: A great halberd of black stone crafted by a civilization now gone to ruin. Wielded by the Guardian Golem.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Golem's Halberd is a uncommon Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Golem's Halberd comes with Charge Forth Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Prelate's Inferno Crozier
weapons.flavorText:
Colossal hammer with the appearance of roiling flames. Weapon of the Prelates who lead the Fire Monks. Its heft represents the weight of their guardianship. 
The hammer's head is unusually substantial, and strong attacks' will fling foes into the air.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Prelate's Inferno Crozier is a rare Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Prelate's Inferno Crozier comes with Prelate's Charge Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Rotten Greataxe
weapons.flavorText:
Greataxe designed for gladiatorial combat, now festering with scarlet rot. 
Used by duelists who were exiled from the colosseum.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Rotten Greataxe is a uncommon Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard, and it has innate Scarlet Rot buildup on hit.
Rotten Greataxe comes with Endure Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Rotten Staff
weapons.flavorText:
Ceremonial staff depicting the Erdtree in its historic radiance. It festers with scarlet rot. 
Wielded by the avatars who protect the Minor Erdtrees.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Rotten Staff is a rare Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it has innate Scarlet Rot buildup on hit.
Rotten Staff comes with Erdtree Slam Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Staff Of The Avatar
weapons.flavorText: Ceremonial staff depicting the Erdtree in its historic radiance. Wielded by the avatars who protect the Minor Erdtrees. The avatars, emerging in the wake of the Elden Ring's shattering, were determined to protect the withering Erdtree's offspring.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Staff Of The Avatar is a rare Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Staff Of The Avatar comes with Erdtree Slam Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Troll's Hammer
weapons.flavorText:
Mining tool of stonedigger trolls used to crack bedrock. 
Trolls are descended from the giants, and these were supposedly once used as ceremonial smithing tools. In the distant past, smithing was considered divine.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Troll's Hammer is a uncommon Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Troll's Hammer comes with Troll's Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Watchdog's Staff
weapons.flavorText:
Large stone staff embedded with glintstone. Wielded by Erdtree Burial Watchdogs who protect catacombs. 
The Watchdogs, battered and broken over their lengthy tenure, rule the catacombs and are even said to command the imps.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Watchdog's Staff is a rare Colossal Weapon in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Watchdog's Staff comes with Sorcery Of The Crozier Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Bolt Of Gransax
weapons.flavorText:
Spear whittled from the weapon wielded by Gransax. One of the legendary armaments. 
A great ancient dragon, Gransax once rained calamity upon the Royal Capital - the only time in historical record that Leyndell's walls have fallen. This marked the dawn of the war against dragons.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Bolt Of Gransax is a legendary Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Lightning damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Bolt Of Gransax comes with Ancient Lightning Spear Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Celebrant's Rib-rake
weapons.flavorText:
Rake decorated with many-colored fabrics. Ceremonial tool used by dancers during the festivities of Dominula, Windmill Village. 
Crafted from human bone.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Celebrant's Rib-rake is a uncommon Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Celebrant's Rib-rake comes with Barbaric Roar Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Clayman's Harpoon
weapons.flavorText:
Harpoon with a tip made from a sharpened meteorite shard. Wielded by the claymen who infest dynastic remains. 
The blade emits a faint light and deals magic damage.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Clayman's Harpoon is a uncommon Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Clayman's Harpoon comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Cleanrot Spear
weapons.flavorText:
Spear of the Cleanrot Knights who fought alongside Malenia, Blade of Miquella. The winged golden blade deals holy damage. 
The diminutive shield is blessed with an incantation that wards off rot.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Cleanrot Spear is a rare Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Cleanrot Spear comes with Sacred Phalanx Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Cross-naginata
weapons.flavorText:
Weapon consisting of a three-pronged blade affixed to a long pole. The long central blade closely resembles a katana. 
A weapon of the Land of Reeds, known for its ability to be wielded as a spear while still being capable of performing slashing attacks.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Cross-naginata is a uncommon Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Cross-naginata comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Crystal Spear
weapons.flavorText: Spear fashioned from pure crystal; a deed impossible for a human. Enwreathed with powerful magic, its attack scales with intelligence. The inscrutable Crystalians have but one clear purpose; to safeguard their crystals unto the end. One theory posits that they yearn for the return of their creator who will carve for them new brethren.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Crystal Spear is a uncommon Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Crystal Spear comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Death Ritual Spear
weapons.flavorText:
Ritual spear used by priests of old who were permitted to come among the Deathbirds. 
The priests became guardians of the birds through the rite of Death, which also serves as an oath sworn to their distant resurrection.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Death Ritual Spear is a rare Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Death Ritual Spear comes with Spearcall Ritual Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Inquisitor's Girandole
weapons.flavorText:
Instrument of torture used on nobles behind the curtain at the Volcano Manor of Mt. Gelmir. 
Its numerous spikes pierce the flesh, then singe the wounds with flame. The smell of burnt blood induces despair in the victim. A candlestick conceived by a thorough mind.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Inquisitor's Girandole is a rare Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Inquisitor's Girandole comes with Charge Forth Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Iron Spear
weapons.flavorText:
Commonly used iron spear with no notable traits. 
The blade is severely rusted.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Iron Spear is a common Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Iron Spear comes with Charge Forth Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Partisan
weapons.flavorText:
Spear with a wide tip. 
In addition to its thrusting attacks, this highly versatile weapon can be swung to sweep through foes.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Partisan is a uncommon Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Partisan comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Pike
weapons.flavorText:
A longspear featuring an especially lengthy handle. 
Specialized for use from long distances, it boasts the longest reach of any melee weapon.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Pike is a uncommon Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Pike comes with Charge Forth Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Rotten Crystal Spear
weapons.flavorText:
Spear fashioned from pure crystal; a deed impossible for a human. It festers with scarlet rot. 
Enwreathed with powerful magic, its attack scales with intelligence.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Rotten Crystal Spear is a uncommon Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it has innate Scarlet Rot buildup on hit.
Rotten Crystal Spear comes with Charge Forth Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Short Spear
weapons.flavorText:
An exceedingly plain spear of modest weight. 
Simple to wield compared to many of its peers, its strong attack unleashes a series of successive piercing thrusts.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Short Spear is a common Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Short Spear comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Spear
weapons.flavorText:
Weapon comprised of a blade attached to a long haft. 
A far-reaching piercing weapon, it can be wielded from behind the safety of a raised shield. Very effective against mounted foes.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Spear is a common Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Spear comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Spiked Spear
weapons.flavorText:
Weapon comprised of a spiked cylinder attached to a long pole. Capable of dealing strike damage when swung. The spikes induce blood loss. 
Weapon of the Marionette Soldiers employed by sorcerers.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Spiked Spear is a uncommon Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Spiked Spear comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Torchpole
weapons.flavorText:
Torch fastened to a long pole. Lights up dark areas, but cannot be raised overhead. 
Used by soldiers on watch, its attacks set foes aflame.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Torchpole is a uncommon Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Torchpole comes with Charge Forth Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Lance
weapons.flavorText:
Considered a type of greatspear, this weapon has no blade, but instead features a long, conical body designed to pierce.
Though heavy and hard to wield, this weapon displays its worth in horseback combat whether mounted or even on foot.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Lance is a common Great Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Lance comes with Charge Forth Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Mohgwyn's Sacred Spear
weapons.flavorText:
Trident of Mohg, Lord of Blood. A sacred spear that will come to symbolize his dynasty. 
As well as serving as a weapon, it is an instrument of communion with an outer god who bestows power upon accursed blood. The mother of truth desires a wound.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Mohgwyn's Sacred Spear is a legendary Great Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Arcane scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Mohgwyn's Sacred Spear comes with Bloodboon Ritual Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Serpent-hunter
weapons.flavorText: Weapon that serves as both greatsword and spear. Thought tohave been used to hunt an immortal great serpent in the distantpast, it manifests a long blade of light when facing such a creature. When their master's heroic aspirations degenerated into meregreed, his men searched for a weapon with which they might halttheir lord.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Serpent-hunter is a uncommon Great Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Serpent-hunter comes with Great-serpent Hunt Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Siluria's Tree
weapons.flavorText:
Siluria's Tree, weapon of one of the two honored as foremost among the Crucible Knights. 
The primordial form of the Erdtree is close in nature to life itself, and this spear, modeled on its crucible, is imbued with ancient holy essence.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Siluria's Tree is a rare Great Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Siluria's Tree comes with Siluria's Woe Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Treespear
weapons.flavorText:
Golden spear with tree-like design. Wielded by knights employed as palace guards in the Royal Capital of Leyndell. Deals holy damage. 
Requiring superior dexterity to wield, this greatspear can perform consecutive thrust attacks despide its large size.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Treespear is a uncommon Great Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Treespear comes with Sacred Order Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Vyke's War Spear
weapons.flavorText:
War spear singed and blistered by fingers, used by Vyke, Knight of the Roundtable Hold. 
Like Vyke himself, it has been tormented by the yellow flame of frenzy from within.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Vyke's War Spear is a rare Great Spear in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it has innate Madness buildup on hit.
Vyke's War Spear comes with Frenzyflame Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Banished Knight's Halberd
weapons.flavorText:
A finely-crafted halberd intricately engraved with an ancient motif. Given to knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes.
 Most of these knights were sent to the fringes, where they were forced to start anew with only despair for company.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Banished Knight's Halberd is a common Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Banished Knight's Halberd comes with Charge Forth Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Commander's Standard
weapons.flavorText:
A beaten red battle standard is furled around this time-worn halberd. 
Even after his lord was fled, Commander O'Neil continued to brandish this flag in the devastation of the rot-eaten field of battle, the sole veteran who remembers this battle with pride.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Commander's Standard is a rare Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Commander's Standard comes with Rallying Standard Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Dragon Halberd
weapons.flavorText:
Halberd shaped like a dragon, enwreathed with both ice and lightning. 
Alas, the Dragonkin Soldiers never attained immortality, and perished as decrepit, pale imitations of their skyborn kin.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Dragon Halberd is a rare Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Dragon Halberd comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Gargoyle's Black Halberd
weapons.flavorText:
Bronze halberd wielded by Valiant Gargoyles, mended with blackened corpse wax. Deals holy damage. 
Such is the mark of those who serve Maliketh, the Black Blade.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Gargoyle's Black Halberd is a rare Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Gargoyle's Black Halberd comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Gargoyle's Halberd
weapons.flavorText:
Bronze halberd wielded by Valiant Gargoyles.
 Just like the wielder, the missing parts have been mended with corpse wax; a patchwork of champions.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Gargoyle's Halberd is a uncommon Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Gargoyle's Halberd comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Glaive
weapons.flavorText:
Weapon comprised of a sharp blade affixed to a long grip. It is in fact a sickle repurposed to be a tool of war. 
This far-reaching weapon excels at slashing attacks.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Glaive is a common Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Glaive comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Golden Halberd
weapons.flavorText:
Weighty halberd forged of gold. Wielded by the Order of Tree Sentinels, heavily equipped knights. Deals holy damage. 
A masterfully crafted weapon that lives up to its heft, but is difficult for one mere human strength to wield.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Golden Halberd is a rare Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Golden Halberd comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Guardian's Swordspear
weapons.flavorText:
Weapon comprising a long handle and broad blade sharpened from the hard wood of old trees. 
Wielded by guardians of the Minor Erdtrees, known as experts in the arts of combat. The power of this weapon scales greatly with dexterity.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Guardian's Swordspear is a uncommon Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Guardian's Swordspear comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Guardian's Halberd
weapons.flavorText:
A halberd wielded by warriors of the winged realm. Engraved with the crest of a wing, which also serves to reduce its weight.
The winged realm is populated entirely by Pinionfolk, for whom the wing is a proud symbol of their bloodline.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Guardian's Halberd is a common Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Guardian's Halberd comes with Charge Forth Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Halberd
weapons.flavorText:
A long-handled polearm that combines the functions of both axe and spear. 
Can be used to press a single enemy with continuous thrusting attacks or swept at groups, taking advantage of its great reach and cleaving blade. A versatile weapon for any situation.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Halberd is a common Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Halberd comes with Charge Forth Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Loretta's War Sickle
weapons.flavorText:
Intricately crafted silver war sickle wielded by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree. 
Originally given for service as a personal guard to Carian royalty, the weapon's blue glintstone has been replaced with unalloyed gold.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Loretta's War Sickle is a rare Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Loretta's War Sickle comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Lucerne
weapons.flavorText:
This polearm features a hard, sharpened beak-like spike attached to its head, designed to pierce armor. 
Though designed mainly as a thrusting weapon, its long handle can be utilized to get around an enemy's guard with a sideward sweeping attack.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Lucerne is a common Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Lucerne comes with Charge Forth Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Nightrider Glaive
weapons.flavorText:
A jet-black glaive with a blade as weighty as a bludgeon. Weapon of the Night's Cavalry who ride funeral steeds. 
This glaive excels at weighty slash attacks that crash into foes, making it a powerful weapon even on horse back.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Nightrider Glaive is a uncommon Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Nightrider Glaive comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Pest's Glaive
weapons.flavorText:
Glaive made from a hard, sharpened shell. Wielded by the pests who emerged from the Swamp of Aeonia. Slightly increases non-physical damage negation. 
Though men might recognize the keen intellect of the pests evidenced by this spear's uncanny design, it will never be understood by them.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Pest's Glaive is a uncommon Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Pest's Glaive comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Ripple Crescent Halberd
weapons.flavorText:
Weapon wielded by young Albinaurics. 
The blade is said to resemble a partial image of a ripple, and its attack power scales with one's arcane attribute.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Ripple Crescent Halberd is a uncommon Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Arcane scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Ripple Crescent Halberd comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Vulgar Militia Saw
weapons.flavorText:
A weapon comprised of a saw blade attached to a long grip. 
Brandished by the vulgar militia, its serrated edge is very effective at inflicting blood loss. The saw is said to also be used to cut up bodies to feed the militia, but there are no firsthand witnesses to confirm the dire rumor.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Vulgar Militia Saw is a common Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Vulgar Militia Saw comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Vulgar Militia Shotel
weapons.flavorText:
A hooked blade attached to a long handle. Wielded by the vulgar militia, its attacks can slip through an enemy's guard. 
The vulgar militia are the undecorated stewards of rancid, scorched battlefields that none dare approach, and forbidden domains better forgotten by the rest of the world
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Vulgar Militia Shotel is a common Halberd in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Standard / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Vulgar Militia Shotel comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Grave Scythe
weapons.flavorText:
Greatscythe comprised of a large blade affixed to a crooked stick. Weapon wielded by the aged grave keepers who tend the forgotten graveyards throughout the Lands Between. 
This weapon is said to have served as a charm against evil spirits in times of old.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Grave Scythe is a uncommon Reaper in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Grave Scythe comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Halo Scythe
weapons.flavorText:
War scythe of the Cleanrot Knights who fought alongside Malenia, Blade of Miquella. 
This was the weapon of commanders in Malenia's army, and the half-halo blade deals holy damage.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Halo Scythe is a rare Reaper in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Halo Scythe comes with Miquella's Ring Of Light Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Scythe
weapons.flavorText:
Large scythe featuring a long, slender blade. Designed to reap, this weapon is capable of rapidly inflicting blood loss while also slipping through an enemy's guard. 
In the hands of a highly dexterous wielder it is capable of striking fear into the heart of any foe.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Scythe is a common Reaper in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Scythe comes with  Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Winged Scythe
weapons.flavorText:
Sacred scythe resembling a pair of white wings. Deals holy damage. 
According to pagan belief, white-winged maidens are said to be Death's gentle envoys.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Winged Scythe is a rare Reaper in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Winged Scythe comes with Angel's Wings Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Giant's Red Braid
weapons.flavorText:
Hefty whip woven from the flame-red hair of a Fire Giant. 
Every giant is red of hair, and Radagon was said to have despised his own red locks. Perhaps that was a curse of their kind.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Giant's Red Braid is a legendary Whip in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Giant's Red Braid comes with Flame Dance Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Hoslow's Petal Whip
weapons.flavorText:
Metal whip formed of razor-sharp chain-link blades that have the appearance of flower petals. This work of art is handed down though the generations of the illustrious House Hoslow. 
High dexterity is required to wield this weapon, but it excels at inflicting devastating blood loss.
"The tale of House Hoslow is told in blood."
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Hoslow's Petal Whip is a rare Whip in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Hoslow's Petal Whip comes with Kick Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Magma Whip Candlestick
weapons.flavorText:
This ritual implement is a three pronged candlestick with solid flames formed of the magma of Mt. Gelmir. 
When wielded as a weapon, the flames become supple whips of lava.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Magma Whip Candlestick is a rare Whip in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Magma Whip Candlestick comes with Sea Of Magma Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Thorned Whip
weapons.flavorText:
Hefty whip covered in crimson thorns. Weapon of the Prelates who lead the Fire Monks. A device of fearsome religious encouragement, it is fashioned in the image of the briars of sin. 
Very effective at inflicting blood loss.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Thorned Whip is a uncommon Whip in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Thorned Whip comes with Kick Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Urumi
weapons.flavorText:
This weapon made of extremely thin, flexible blades of metal is wielded like a whip by Nightfolk warriors. 
Though in essence a whip with a cutting edge, it can also be used as a spear to pierce foes.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Urumi is a uncommon Whip in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Urumi comes with Kick Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Whip
weapons.flavorText:
A leather whip. Not originally used for combat, but as an instrument of pain.
 Through its supple attacks cannot be thwarted by parrying or even guarding, it is incapable of dealing critical hits.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Whip is a common Whip in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Whip comes with Kick Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Caestus
weapons.flavorText:
A weapon built for striking with the fists, made of tough leather inlaid with iron rivets. 
Fist weapons come in pairs, and two-handing this weapon will equip it to both hands.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Caestus is a common Fist in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Caestus comes with Endure Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Cipher Pata
weapons.flavorText:
One of the weapons originating from the Two Fingers. A formless sequence of ciphers comprise its blade, and as such no shield can repel it. Deals holy damage. 
The furtive inscription appears to hang in the air; the language of light spoken by the Two Fingers.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Cipher Pata is a rare Fist in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Holy damage and has Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Cipher Pata comes with Unblockable Blade Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Clinging Bone
weapons.flavorText:
Horrific weapon made of a hardened skeletal arm. Wielded by Ensha of the Royal Remains. 
Fitted by placing one's hands into the fists' grips until they dig in. "O clinging creature. A king relinquishes not the hand."
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Clinging Bone is a rare Fist in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Arcane scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Clinging Bone comes with Lifesteal Fist Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Grafted Dragon
weapons.flavorText:
The embodiment of the power that still remained in the dragon's head that was grafted to Godrick's left arm.
The wielder's arm will take the form of a small dragon, sprouting sharp dragon fangs at the fist.
This weapon cannot be two-handed.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Grafted Dragon is a legendary Fist in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Fire damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Grafted Dragon comes with Bear Witness Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Iron Ball
weapons.flavorText:
Iron manifer of spherical shape. Big Boggart the blackguard's weapon of choice. 
Not a weapon to be taken lightly, as its weighty blows shatter bones with ease.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Iron Ball is a uncommon Fist in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Iron Ball comes with Endure Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Katar
weapons.flavorText: Imported dagger design with a rather unique handle. The blade can be swung about as the extension of one's fist.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Katar is a common Fist in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Katar comes with Impaling Thrust Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Spiked Caestus
weapons.flavorText:
A Caestus with the rivets replaced by blood loss-inducing spikes. 
Fists weapons come in pairs, and two-handing this weapon will equip it to both hands.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Spiked Caestus is a uncommon Fist in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Spiked Caestus comes with Endure Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Star Fist
weapons.flavorText:
Spherical iron manifer covered in spikes which induce blood loss. 
Used in brutal games of pugilism.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Star Fist is a uncommon Fist in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Strike, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Star Fist comes with Endure Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Veteran's Prosthesis
weapons.flavorText: Bladed prosthetic leg enwreathed with the power of lightning, instead attached to the fist. Commander Niall, veteran of Castle Sol, offered this prosthesis in exchange for the lives of defeated knights held prisoner. He went on to lead these men as an army of no nation.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Veteran's Prosthesis is a rare Fist in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Lightning damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Veteran's Prosthesis comes with Storm Kick Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Bloodhound Claws
weapons.flavorText:
Large curved claws used by Bloodhound Knights. 
The curve allows the weapon to slip through an enemy's guard.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Bloodhound Claws is a uncommon Claw in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Bloodhound Claws comes with Bloodhound's Step Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Hookclaws
weapons.flavorText:
Weapon worn on the fist comprised of sharp parallel blades favored by those who lurk in the dark. Lacerations cause blood loss with great effect. 
Claw weapons come in pairs, and two-handing this weapon will equip it to both hands.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Hookclaws is a common Claw in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Hookclaws comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Raptor Talons
weapons.flavorText:
Claw comprised of two sharp, thin blades, wielded by the assassins of Ravenmount, this weapon allows them to imitate the attacks of Deathbirds. 
Besides excelling at airborne attacks, its charge attack mimics the vicious swoop of a bird of prey.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Raptor Talons is a rare Claw in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Hemorrhage buildup on hit.
Raptor Talons comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Venomous Fang
weapons.flavorText:
One of the weapons designed for gladiatorial combat. Used by duelists who were exiled from the colosseum. 
The black fang protruding from the bronze snake head is coated in deadly poison.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Venomous Fang is a uncommon Claw in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Slash / Pierce, and it has innate Poison buildup on hit.
Venomous Fang comes with Quickstep Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Composite Bow
weapons.flavorText:
Bow composited from a mix of Materials.
Demands high attributes, and is tricky to wield, but is a fearsome tool when mastered.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Composite Bow is a uncommon Light Bow in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Composite Bow comes with Mighty Shot Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Harp Bow
weapons.flavorText:
Bow fashioned from a minstrel's harp. Sonorous tones still resound when firing arrows.
Troubadours sing tales of champions, both in the honorable service of the Erdtree, and the one who spurns honor for blasphemy.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Harp Bow is a uncommon Light Bow in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Harp Bow comes with Barrage Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Misbegotten Shortbow
weapons.flavorText:
Shortbow wielded by Winged Misbegotten. Fine fur clings to it.
Designed to inflict additional damage by sacrificing range.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Misbegotten Shortbow is a common Light Bow in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Misbegotten Shortbow comes with Barrage Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Red Branch Shortbow
weapons.flavorText:
Shortbow of polished red wood. Fashioned by a master craftsman and wielded by pages.
A bow which requires dexterity rather than strength to master.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Red Branch Shortbow is a uncommon Light Bow in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Red Branch Shortbow comes with Barrage Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Shortbow
weapons.flavorText: Small bow made to fire arrows over great distances. Other than its ability to fire off arrows in rapid succession, it is also well-suited for use on horseback.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Shortbow is a common Light Bow in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Shortbow comes with Barrage Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Albinauric Bow
weapons.flavorText:
Longbow featuring delicate silverwork. Wielded by Albinauric wolfback archers.
This bow requires dexterity over strength to master.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Albinauric Bow is a uncommon Bow in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Albinauric Bow comes with Mighty Shot Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Black Bow
weapons.flavorText:
Longbow carved from black wood to resemble a blade. One of the most difficult bows to master.
The blade-like body of the bow is light and cuts through the air. Can be wielded as nimbly as light bow, despite its fuller size.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Black Bow is a rare Bow in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Black Bow comes with Barrage Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Erdtree Bow
weapons.flavorText:
Longbow featuring Erdtree styling. In times of old, when faith and battle went hand in hand, this weapon was created in tandem with the Golden Arrow.
Scales all arrow damage with faith.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Erdtree Bow is a rare Bow in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Erdtree Bow comes with Mighty Shot Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Horn Bow
weapons.flavorText:
Longbow made from animal horn. Wielded by the master hunters of the ancestral followers.
Imbues arrows fired with magic damage.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Horn Bow is a uncommon Bow in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Magic damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Intelligence scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Horn Bow comes with Mighty Shot Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Longbow
weapons.flavorText: Longbow made to fire arrows over great distances. Compared to a shortbow, arrows fired reach further and deal more damage.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Longbow is a common Bow in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Longbow comes with Mighty Shot Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Pulley Bow
weapons.flavorText:
Longbow which utilizes a series of pulleys and strings. The complex mechanism, which required advanced mathematical and mechanical understanding to craft, was likely made by a certain genius who learned Golden Order Fundamentalism.
Enhances precision while shooting, enabling arrows to fly much further distances.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Pulley Bow is a rare Bow in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength and Dexterity scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Pulley Bow comes with Mighty Shot Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Serpent Bow
weapons.flavorText:
Malformed bow in the shape of a pair of poisonous snakes. Imbues arrows with poison through pagan magic.
Used by assassins known as the Formless Serpents.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Serpent Bow is a rare Bow in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Arcane scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Serpent Bow comes with Mighty Shot Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Erdtree Greatbow
weapons.flavorText:
Greatbow featuring Erdtree styling. In times of old, when faith and battle went hand in hand, this weapon was created in tandem with the Golden Great Arrow.
Scales all arrow damage with faith.
weapons.wikiWeaponDescriptionText:
Erdtree Greatbow is a rare Greatbow in Elden Ring Nightreign. This weapon deals Physical and Holy damage and has Strength, Dexterity and Faith scaling.
Its attack affinity is Pierce, and it does not have innate Status Ailment buildup on hit.
Erdtree Greatbow comes with Through And Through Ash of War (Weapon Skill).

weapons.name: Golem Greatbow
weapons.flavorText:
Greatbow of black stone crafted by a civilization now gone to ruin. Weapon of the Guardian Golem.
Extremely heavy, this greatbow requires enormous strength just to draw, suggesting it was not designed for human use.
